messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Mon, Nov 28, 2011 at 9:36 AM,  <cw@f00f.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: rsc,
>
> Message:
> Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> strings: fix test output
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5445044/
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/strings/strings_test.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/strings/strings_test.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/strings/strings_test.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/strings/strings_test.go
> @@ -527,7 +527,7 @@
>                case "TrimRight":
>                        f = TrimRight
>                default:
> -                       t.Error("Undefined trim function %s", name)
> +                       t.Errorf("Undefined trim function %s", name)
>                }
>                actual := f(tc.in, tc.cutset)
>                if actual != tc.out {
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b4081c57ba32 ***

strings: fix test output

R=rsc, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5445044

Committer: Robert Griesemer <gri@golang.org>

subject: code review 5445044: strings: fix test output
